summary: In 1924 Estie comes to Hollywood to become an actress, but the dog, that followed her becomes the star. But Hollywood has its own rules of success.
cast: Dennis Morgan|Shecky Greene|Phil Leeds|Cliff Norton|Madeline Kahn|Teri Garr|Romo Vincent|Bruce Dern|Sterling Holloway|William 'Billy' Benedict|Dorothy Gulliver|William Demarest|Art Carney|Virginia Mayo|Henny Youngman|Rory Calhoun|Billy Barty|Henry Wilcoxon|Ricardo Montalban|Jackie Coogan|Aldo Ray|Ethel Merman|Yvonne De Carlo|Joan Blondell|Andy Devine|Broderick Crawford|Richard Arlen|Jack La Rue|Dorothy Lamour|Phil Silvers|Nancy Walker|Gloria DeHaven|Louis Nye|Johnny Weissmuller|Stepin Fetchit|Ken Murray|Rudy Vallee|George Jessel|Rhonda Fleming|Ann Miller|Dean Stockwell|Dick Haymes|Tab Hunter|Robert Alda|Eli Mintz|Ron Leibman|Fritz Feld|Edward Ashley|Kres Mersky|Jane Connell|Janet Blair|Dennis Day|Mike Mazurki|The Ritz Brothers|Jesse White|Carmel Myers|Jack Carter|Jack Bernardi|Victor Mature|Barbara Nichols|Army Archerd|Fernando Lamas|Zsa Zsa Gabor|Cyd Charisse|Huntz Hall|Doodles Weaver|Pedro Gonzalez Gonzalez|Edward Le Veque|Edgar Bergen|Ronny Graham|Morey Amsterdam|Eddie Foy Jr.|Peter Lawford|Patricia Morison|Guy Madison|Regis Toomey|Alice Faye|Ann Rutherford|Milton Berle|James Brodhead|John Carradine|Keye Luke|Walter Pidgeon|Augustus von Schumacher|Don Ames|Gary Bankel|Toni Basil|Leon Belasco|Jack Berle|Robert Buckingham|Donald Chaffin|Peter Paul Eastman|Morgan Farley|Douglas Fowley|Brian Gusse|Bob Harks|Robert Hitchcock|George Hoagland|George Holmes|Tom Pedi|Harry Ritz|Jimmy Ritz|Bob Templeton|Marty Thomas|Arthur Tovey
